title: i just got permanently banned

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: When i said kys i said it as a joke to the enemy team jg  because he camped me bot and he was laughing in all chat calling me bad, the ward spam was to my support not warding but my support late game did do a good job. Plus i did have some honor to jax saying gj to him. That explains my chat logs and i was in promos to bronze 3 so i really wanted to win, you can imagine when you get camped bot by the enemy jg and when your support doesn't ward you get a bit pissed off, so can i get unbanned i'm pretty sure i wont but its worth a try. One more thing this account has gotten banned before like 4 times but that's because i was inting i know now that inting was a really douche thing to do so i have stopped inting now for the past week.

replies.body: Hmm how about no u fucked up and now u get to deal with the consequences. Itâ€™s already known that riot will just ban u for saying kill or self or anything similar so why complain when u know what will happen on top of that u said your account has been banned 4 times for inting so no youve had your chances now deal with the consequence
Banter is not allowed if it triggers the bots.
move on the community has spoken good luck on another game, hope you learned your lesson and dont be negative in that game

aaaaaaaaaaand thats why youre bronze 4, do us a favour, /muteall and let your gameplay do the talking for you, you could always make a new account, a bronze 4 account isnt worth much anyways, trust me.

Start a new account at level 1 bro, learn your lesson.
Entirely deserved.
